info.jonclark.treegraft.core.rules.GrammarRule

Packages that use GrammarRule
info.jonclark.treegraft.chartparser A stochastic transduction chart parser. 
info.jonclark.treegraft.core Core classes that can be shared between various parsers and NLP tools. 
info.jonclark.treegraft.core.formatting.forest Handles the tranformation of Charts into parse forests or hypergraphs. 
info.jonclark.treegraft.core.formatting.parses Transforms parses into strings including such transformations as transduction from source to target languages.

Uses of GrammarRule in info.jonclark.treegraft.chartparser
 

Classes in info.jonclark.treegraft.chartparser with type parameters of type GrammarRule
 class ActiveArc<R extends GrammarRule<T>,T extends Token>
          Represents the current state of a dotted grammar rule in the ChartParser.
 class ActiveArcManager<R extends GrammarRule<T>,T extends Token>
          Handles extending arcs based on incoming Keys and storing partially completed ActiveArcs.
 class Agenda<R extends GrammarRule<T>,T extends Token>
          A temporary storage location for Keys that have been completed, but that have not yet been processed to see how they affect the current state of the ActiveArcs.
 class Chart<R extends GrammarRule<T>,T extends Token>
          A packed forest of Keys that represent the search space of valid parses (and partial parses) for the input sequence that generated the Chart.
 class ChartParser<R extends GrammarRule<T>,T extends Token>
          A left-to-right bottom-up depth-first-search chart parser that accepts both monolingual and synchronous grammars.
 class Key<R extends GrammarRule<T>,T extends Token>
          Stores information about an item that has already been proven to be a complete parse.
 

Uses of GrammarRule in info.jonclark.treegraft.core
 

Classes in info.jonclark.treegraft.core with type parameters of type GrammarRule
 class Grammar<R extends GrammarRule<T>,T extends Token>
          Contains (and can read in) the rules with which input sequences will be parsed.
 class Parse<R extends GrammarRule<T>,T extends Token>
          A grammatical parse for a given input sequence.
 

Uses of GrammarRule in info.jonclark.treegraft.core.formatting.forest

          Transforms a Chart into a parse forest of some arbitrary data type.
 

Uses of GrammarRule in info.jonclark.treegraft.core.formatting.parses
 

Classes in info.jonclark.treegraft.core.formatting.parses with type parameters of type GrammarRule
 class ParseFormatter<R extends GrammarRule<T>,T extends Token>
          Formats a the data contained in a Key into a partial (or complete) parse, which could result in a source tree, target tree, or target string.
 

Uses of GrammarRule in info.jonclark.treegraft.core.rules
 

Classes in info.jonclark.treegraft.core.rules with type parameters of type GrammarRule
 interface RuleFactory<R extends GrammarRule<T>,T extends Token>
          A means for handling on-the-fly creation of dummy rules for terminal symbols during the parsing process and for defining how partial parse output should be formatted for use in debugging.
 

Classes in info.jonclark.treegraft.core.rules that implement GrammarRule
 class MonoCFGRule<T extends Token>
          A monolingual version of a Context-Free GrammarRule.
 class SyncCFGRule<T extends Token>
          A synchronous version of a Context-Free GrammarRule.
